parameters.name: EncryptionContext
parameters.description: A JSON string that consists of key-value pairs. If you specify this parameter, an equivalent value is required when you call the Decrypt operation. For more information, see [EncryptionContext](~~42975~~).

parameters.name: KeyId
parameters.description: The globally unique ID of the CMK. You can also set this parameter to an alias that is bound to the CMK. For more information, see [Use aliases](~~68522~~).

parameters.name: Plaintext
parameters.description: The plaintext to be encrypted. The plaintext must be Base64 encoded.
